author: Perez Hilton
title: Watch Hamilton's Schuyler Sisters Deliver A Powerful Message With Their America The Beautiful Performance For Super Bowl LI!

organizations.name: major brands & retailers hop through harry styles

text:
2/05/2017 6:23   Super Bowl 
YAS!!! 
This is such a treat to have three original members of the Hamilton musical perform America the Beautiful ! 
Renée Elise Goldsberry , Jasmine Cephas Jones and Phillipa Soo , AKA the Schuyler Sisters, performed the stirring song at Super Bowl LI and they were simply AH-Mazing! 
In fact, the talented trio added a little something extra to the lyrics near the end. SISTERHOOD! We loved it! 
Let their dulcet tones take you away (above)! Relive Super Bowl 50 With The Best Celebrity Instagrams! Celebs Get Their Party On At Super Bowl XLVIII!
